title: Modern typewriter-style font
content:
Need help identifying this font or something quite similar. Any suggestions are welcome. Thanks in advance.

Font: 

 Freight 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114747/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [large\_3505849251-600x400.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114747/http:/typophile.com/files/large_3505849251-600x400.jpg) | 37.34 KB |
author: katieaustin

comments.content: **[Freight Micro Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114747/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Garage-Fonts&ffam=FreightMicro%20Bold%20-%20Regular&fid=1c039a661e345513d71c28f1f4354ec6&fsize=60&text=Very%20Memorable%20Design&wrap=2)** by Garage-Fonts is close - if not an exact match
